text: Njoku Nnamdi is a Nigerian politician and member of the 4th National Assembly representing Bende constituency of Abia State under the umbrella of the People's Democratic Party. ==See also== * Nigerian National Assembly delegation from Abia ==References== Category:People from Abia State Category:Living people Category:Igbo politicians Category:People's Democratic Party members of the House of Representatives (Nigeria) Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Njoku Nnamdi
